document.full_text: israel set up a government cyber command on wednesday to secure the country against hacking attacks on its key networks and boost the competitiveness of local industries specializing in high-tech security.
document.title: eye on tech exports, israel launches cyber command
lines_and_colors: israel set up a government cyber command on wednesday to secure the country against hacking attacks on its key networks and boost the competitiveness of local industries specializing in high-tech security.
